How can we make your life easier?
Type my logins for me Gladly! Our Autofill feature will help you log in to sites and apps instantly. Sync logins across my devices Consider it done. We’ll help you install Dashlane everywhere you use the internet so you\'ll always have access to your logins. Warn me about hacks We’ve got your back. We’ll notify you when a website you have an account with gets hacked, and then help you protect your account.
How do you keep track of your logins?
I remember them Time to free up some of your precious brain space! Your Vault’s ready to store everything you need—on any device and browser. I do something else Great to have you here! You’ll love how easy and secure life will feel with your new Vault—and how it works on any device and browser. I use a digital tool You’ll love your new vault—and how it works on any device and browser. We’re ready to import from Chrome, password managers, or Excel files.
